title: Critical Role: The Mighty Nein Origins: Jester Lavorre
description: Jester Lavorre had an unconventional upbringing, even for one born in cosmopolitan Nicodranas. Daughter of the famed Ruby of the Sea, she had many opportunities for mischief as a small child, of which she took full advantage! Dive into the mystery of Jesterâ€™s early years, her first meeting with the Traveler, and the fateful events that set her on a path to eventually join the Mighty Nein.
author: Sam Maggs
